page.title: 10INFORMATION SYSTEMS NETT'M
page.content: The library opened in 1970,staffed by 3 and stocked with 15075 books,3365 for children.80-100 visit the library each day,taking out 300-400 books. About 50 are fined each week,but only 5% misuse books.2136 Adults & 678 children possess tickets.Saturday is the busiest day;Winter is the busiest season.Fiction is most popular,with non_fiction books like,history geog. crafts,etc.being read also.Large print books are also stocked.Two mobile libraries and a Schools library van are based at Nettleham Area H.Q. each staffed by a librarian and a driver. Their routes cover a network of villages between Norton Disney,lea, Hemswell and Middle Rasen,visited fortnightly rota.Librarians find their work busy and interesting.
